name: Office (Offensive Rat)
description:
As of right now Offensive Rat is just 2 people. We noticed a problem, that often we would be up late playing games and all of a sudden run out of stuff to do. Our goal is to make games that will give you something to do. Quick fun whenever you need it. 

Want to Support Us?

When the game is out you can get it for free or donate, but done feel pressured because right now, the best thing you can do for us is to give us feedback and join our community discord server, linked above.
